content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 2822016 the case went through several steps first the cost procedure determined the expenses involved then a judgment was made in the first instance but the details are not mentioned the case was then taken to the supreme court the highest court in the country again specific details are not provided finally some form of financial compensation was awarded the legal procedure lasted until november 17 2016 and the final resolution is based on the judgment made in the first instance the goods involved are specific data the plaintiff is responsible for 75 and the defendant for 25 the court of appeal reviewed the case and made a decision with 65 in favor and 25 against the supreme court dismissed the application for revision based on specific laws the court of first instance determined that the applicant owns 75 of a coowned property while the defendant owns 25 the defendant has now filed an appeal and the court made changes to the initial judgment with the applicant owning 65 and the defendant owning 35 the defendant has filed an application to seek permission to appeal this judgment the applicant argues that the lower courts misapplied the rule of burden of proof and seeks leave to appeal on several issues the supreme court dismissed the application for leave to review based on specific conditions outlined in the civil procedure act

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 282/2016, 17. 11. 2016
